mapper.sql: contentId, channelId, typeId,contentType, modelId, siteId, sortDate, topLevel, hasTitleImg, isRecommend, status, viewsDay, commentsDay, downloadsDay, upsDay,username,userid, recommendLevel
mapper.select: SELECT a.contentId,a.userid userid, a.username username, a.channelId, a.typeId,a.contentType, a.modelId, a.siteId, a.sortDate, a.topLevel, a.hasTitleImg, a.isRecommend, a.status, a.viewsDay, a.commentsDay, a.downloadsDay, a.upsDay,a.recommendLevel, b.channelPath,c.sitePath,c.domain FROM cms_content a LEFT JOIN cms_channel b ON a.channelId = b.channelId LEFT JOIN cms_site c ON a.siteId = c.siteId WHERE a.contentId = #{contentId}
